content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a case that has been ongoing for 7 years and 2 months the court has declared the dissolution of a community of heirs due to the death of one of the coheirs the court has allocated the assets of the community including a property located in torre annunziata the court has determined the amount to be paid to each coheir along with the legal interest rate the coheirs are also responsible for paying their share of the costs for canceling the mortgage registration on the property the court has made a final ruling assigning the property to one of the heirs and ordering payment adjustments to the other coheirs the judgment will be transcribed in the land registries and the parties will be compensated for their litigation costs the ruling was made on july 23 2023 and filed with the registry on july 24 2023
